	return $.lambdaValue
else if($.lambdaValue2)
return $.lambdaValue2
else if($.lambdaValue3)
return $.lambdaValue3
else
return $.lambdaValue4;"},"type":"LAMBDA","startDelay":0,"optional":false,"asyncComplete":false}]

node.name: Build_read_store_LLDP_topology
node.description: {"description": "Build, read and store LLDP topology in database", "labels": ["DEMO","LLDP"]}
inputParameters: {"node-aggregation":{"value":"system-name","description":"Which unique attribute of a device to use in order to identify a device. This reduces node duplicity","type":"string"},"link-aggregation":{"value":"bidirectional-abbreviations","description":"Which unique attribute of a link to use in order to identify a device e.g. source and destination interfaces","type":"string"},"per-node-read-timeout":{"value":"30","description":"Max time to spend on 1 device in seconds","type":"string"},"concurrent-read-nodes":{"value":"8","description":"How many devices to query in parallel","type":"string"},"destination-topology":{"value":"lldp","description":"Name of a topology under which the result will be stored","type":"string"}}
